sqlMap.select: SELECT /* YEAA0060.SEARCH00.개인자료등록확인 조회 */ A.YEA_STD_YY /* YEA_기준년도 */ , A.YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ /* YEA_세액기초일련번호 */ , A.YEA_DED_TYPE_CD /* YEA_공제구분코드 */ , A.YEA_DED_ITEM_CD /* YEA_공제항목코드 */ , A.YEA_DED_ITEM_NM /* YEA_공제항목명 */ , A.YEA_DED_CONTENT /* YEA_공제내용 */ , A.YEA_A_VALUE /* YEA_A값 */ , A.YEA_B_VALUE /* YEA_B값 */ , A.YEA_C_VALUE /* YEA_C값 */ , A.YEA_D_VALUE /* YEA_D값 */ , A.YEA_E_VALUE /* YEA_E값 */ , A.YEA_NOTE /* YEA_비고 */ , A.YEA_SORT_ORD /* YEA_정렬순서 */ , A.YEA_INS_USER_ID /* YEA_입력작업자 */ , A.YEA_INS_DATE /* YEA_입력일시 */ , A.YEA_UPD_USER_ID /* YEA_수정작업자 */ , A.YEA_UPD_DATE /* YEA_수정일시 */ FROM YEA_YETABS A /* [YEA_연말정산세액계산기초] */ WHERE A.YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# /* YEA_기준년도 */
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YEA_YETABS ( /* YEAA0060.SAVE00.개인자료등록확인 저장 [YEA_연말정산세액계산기초] */ YEA_STD_YY /* YEA_기준년도 */ ,YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ /* YEA_세액기초일련번호 */ ,YEA_DED_TYPE_CD /* YEA_공제구분코드 */ ,YEA_DED_ITEM_CD /* YEA_공제항목코드 */ ,YEA_DED_ITEM_NM /* YEA_공제항목명 */ ,YEA_DED_CONTENT /* YEA_공제내용 */ ,YEA_A_VALUE /* YEA_A값 */ ,YEA_B_VALUE /* YEA_B값 */ ,YEA_C_VALUE /* YEA_C값 */ ,YEA_D_VALUE /* YEA_D값 */ ,YEA_E_VALUE /* YEA_E값 */ ,YEA_NOTE /* YEA_비고 */ ,YEA_SORT_ORD /* YEA_정렬순서 */ ,YEA_INS_USER_ID /* YEA_입력작업자 */ ,YEA_INS_DATE /* YEA_입력일시 */ ,YEA_UPD_USER_ID /* YEA_수정작업자 */ ,YEA_UPD_DATE /* YEA_수정일시 */ ) VALUES ( #YEA_STD_YY# /* YEA_기준년도 */ ,#YEA_DED_TYPE_CD#||#YEA_DED_ITEM_CD# /* YEA_세액기초일련번호 */ ,#YEA_DED_TYPE_CD# /* YEA_공제구분코드 */ ,#YEA_DED_ITEM_CD# /* YEA_공제항목코드 */ ,#YEA_DED_ITEM_NM# /* YEA_공제항목명 */ ,#YEA_DED_CONTENT# /* YEA_공제내용 */ ,#YEA_A_VALUE# /* YEA_A값 */ ,#YEA_B_VALUE# /* YEA_B값 */ ,#YEA_C_VALUE# /* YEA_C값 */ ,#YEA_D_VALUE# /* YEA_D값 */ ,#YEA_E_VALUE# /* YEA_E값 */ ,#YEA_NOTE# /* YEA_비고 */ ,#YEA_SORT_ORD# /* YEA_정렬순서 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /* YEA_입력작업자 */ ,SYSDATE /* YEA_입력일시 */ ,#UPDT_USID# /* YEA_수정작업자 */ ,SYSDATE /* YEA_수정일시 */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YEA_YETABS /* EVMA0060.UPDATE00.개인자료등록확인 수정 *//* [YEA_연말정산세액계산기초] */ SET YEA_DED_TYPE_CD = #YEA_DED_TYPE_CD# /* YEA_공제구분코드 */ , YEA_DED_ITEM_CD = #YEA_DED_ITEM_CD# /* YEA_공제항목코드 */ , YEA_DED_ITEM_NM = #YEA_DED_ITEM_NM# /* YEA_공제항목명 */ , YEA_DED_CONTENT = #YEA_DED_CONTENT# /* YEA_공제내용 */ , YEA_A_VALUE = #YEA_A_VALUE# /* YEA_A값 */ , YEA_B_VALUE = #YEA_B_VALUE# /* YEA_B값 */ , YEA_C_VALUE = #YEA_C_VALUE# /* YEA_C값 */ , YEA_D_VALUE = #YEA_D_VALUE# /* YEA_D값 */ , YEA_E_VALUE = #YEA_E_VALUE# /* YEA_E값 */ , YEA_NOTE = #YEA_NOTE# /* YEA_비고 */ , YEA_SORT_ORD = #YEA_SORT_ORD# /* YEA_정렬순서 */ , YEA_UPD_USER_ID = #UPDT_USID# /* YEA_수정작업자 */ , YEA_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE /* YEA_수정일시 */ WHERE YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# /* YEA_기준년도 */ AND YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ = #YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ# /* YEA_세액기초일련번호 */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YEA_YETABS /* YEAA0060.DELETE00.개인자료등록확인 삭제 [YEA_연말정산세액계산기초] */ WHERE YEA_STD_YY = #YEA_STD_YY# /* YEA_기준년도 */ AND YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ = #YEA_TAX_STD_SEQ# /* YEA_세액기초일련번호 */
